name: Indian Police Car 2: New Parki
description:
Indian Police Car 2: New Parking Sim Game is the newest, action packed police car parking and driving simulation game. You are the police, take to the narrow city streets in real police car and reach the designated parking spot somewhere in the back alleys of the city.
Features:
Offroad contains various car parking missions
HD graphics
Different Game levels
Free Customization of 3D cars
Realistic car controls, steering wheel, brake and gear
Real car sounds and visual effects
Smooth and Realistic Game play
